sentence: (Tom Williams-Pool/Getty Images / Getty Images) Regarding claims that Ossoff's bill is stronger because it applies to dependent children and also requires offending members of Congress to surrender their congressional salary, Hawley pointed out that his bill would mandate that they disgorge their investments to the U.S. Treasury.
